title: Why are people so mad about 'Apple' products? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's the after-sales relationship that Apple maintains with customers that drives loyalty.. Other OEMs are just interested in sales, but not the continued support after sales and possibly warranty period.
Coz an Apple a Day....keeps the doc away..!!! PS: I'm sorry I'm a part of the same club. Just habitual enough of the touch and the 'Jobs' factor creeps in too.
